usefulItems: ThermoMat, ThermoMat or plastic wrap, refrigerator
title: Shortcrust pastry

ingredients.content: 150 g plain flour, plus extra for flouring
75 g butter, chilled, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place plain flour, butter, salt and water into mixing bowl and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>.
Transfer pastry onto a ThermoMat or floured surface and work into a flattened ball. Wrap dough in ThermoMat or plastic wrap and refrigerate until needed or use pastry as described in other recipes.

hintsAndTricks: Use shortcrust pastry for sweet or savoury tarts.
Unbaked shortcrust pastry freezes well. Freeze dough partially rolled out for faster defrosting in the refrigerator.

To blind bake a tart crust, use a rolling pin to roll out pastry onto a ThermoMat or lightly floured work surface. Line a greased quiche or tart tin with the pastry and prick with a fork to avoid air bubbles. Line pastry with baking paper and fill with pie weights (e.g. rice, beans) before baking in a preheated oven (180°C) for 15 minutes. Remove baking paper and pie weights and bake for a further 5 minutes or until golden brown.
